title: Mammoth Cave National Park: Alcohol Policy
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Laws & Policies     Alcohol Policy                Alcohol Policy at Mammoth Cave NP      The consumption of alcoholic beverages in all public buildings in the park, aboard all vessels carrying passengers for hire, and in all caves is prohibited, except the consumption and/or possession of alcohol at concessions facilities and park facilities as authorized by the Superintendent. Edmonson, Hart, and Barren Counties are "dry", except for Cave City, in which individual restaurants may serve alcoholic beverages by the glass.
